item.title: Open Source Media
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Tony Perkins: Now we have the opportunity to do "open source media" for the benefit of all. I think successful media brands will have an increasing share of their content generated directly by their audience. In the cooking arena, we're so far ahead of the game already with Recipezaar and just getting to start some interesting new stuff. It's gonna be a fun next few years. :-)
